TestCase.name: testAppendOptions[0: is-bounded=true]
TestCase.Resource: select * from t1/*+ OPTIONS(k5='v5', 'a.b.c'='fakeVal') */

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]])

Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testAppendOptions[1: is-bounded=false]
TestCase.Resource: select * from t1/*+ OPTIONS(k5='v5', 'a.b.c'='fakeVal') */

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]])

Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testOptionsHintOnTableApiView[0: is-bounded=true]
TestCase.Resource: select * from view1/*+ OPTIONS(k1='#v1', k2='#v2', k3='#v3', k4='#v4') */

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2})]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=v3, k4=v4})]]])

MultipleInput(readOrder=[0,1], members=[
HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], build=[right])
:- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c])
: +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=v3, k4=v4})]]], fields=[d, e, f]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2})]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithAppendedOptions[0: is-bounded=true]
TestCase.Resource: select * from t1 /*+ OPTIONS(k5='v5', 'a.b.c'='fakeVal') */ join t2 /*+ OPTIONS(k6='v6', 'd.e.f'='fakeVal') */ on t1.a = t2.d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={d.e.f=fakeVal, k3=v3, k4=v4, k6=v6})], dynamic options: {d.e.f=fakeVal, k6=v6}]])

MultipleInput(readOrder=[0,1], members=[
HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], build=[right])
:- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c])
: +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={d.e.f=fakeVal, k3=v3, k4=v4, k6=v6})], dynamic options: {d.e.f=fakeVal, k6=v6}]], fields=[d, e, f]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithAppendedOptions[1: is-bounded=false]
TestCase.Resource: select * from t1 /*+ OPTIONS(k5='v5', 'a.b.c'='fakeVal') */ join t2 /*+ OPTIONS(k6='v6', 'd.e.f'='fakeVal') */ on t1.a = t2.d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={d.e.f=fakeVal, k3=v3, k4=v4, k6=v6})], dynamic options: {d.e.f=fakeVal, k6=v6}]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2, a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5})], dynamic options: {a.b.c=fakeVal, k5=v5}]], fields=[a, b]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={d.e.f=fakeVal, k3=v3, k4=v4, k6=v6})], dynamic options: {d.e.f=fakeVal, k6=v6}]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithOverriddenOptions[0: is-bounded=true]
TestCase.Resource: select * from t1 /*+ OPTIONS(k1='#v1', k2='#v2') */ join t2 /*+ OPTIONS(k3='#v3', k4='#v4') */ on t1.a = t2.d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=#v1, k2=#v2})], dynamic options: {k1=#v1, k2=#v2}]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=#v3, k4=#v4})], dynamic options: {k3=#v3, k4=#v4}]])

MultipleInput(readOrder=[0,1], members=[
HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], build=[right])
:- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c])
: +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=#v3, k4=#v4})], dynamic options: {k3=#v3, k4=#v4}]], fields=[d, e, f]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=#v1, k2=#v2})], dynamic options: {k1=#v1, k2=#v2}]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithOverriddenOptions[1: is-bounded=false]
TestCase.Resource: select * from t1 /*+ OPTIONS(k1='#v1', k2='#v2') */ join t2 /*+ OPTIONS(k3='#v3', k4='#v4') */ on t1.a = t2.d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=#v1, k2=#v2})], dynamic options: {k1=#v1, k2=#v2}]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=#v3, k4=#v4})], dynamic options: {k3=#v3, k4=#v4}]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=#v1, k2=#v2})], dynamic options: {k1=#v1, k2=#v2}]], fields=[a, b]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=#v3, k4=#v4})], dynamic options: {k3=#v3, k4=#v4}]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.Resource: select * from view1/*+ OPTIONS(k1='#v1', k2='#v2', k3='#v3', k4='#v4') */

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2})]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=v3, k4=v4})]]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k1=v1, k2=v2})]]], fields=[a, b]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t2, source: [OptionsTableSource(props={k3=v3, k4=v4})]]], fields=[d, e, f])

MultipleInput(readOrder=[0,1], members=[
HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], build=[right])
:- Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c])
: +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
